headline: How Copart's (CPRT) Rising Profitability and Revenue Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Copart, Inc. recently reported its fourth quarter and full-year 2025 results, with quarterly revenue rising to US$1,125.1 million and full-year net income reaching US$1.55 billion, both up from the prior year. The company's announcement also highlighted increased earnings per share and rising profitability, underscoring operational growth during the period. We'll take a closer look at how Copart’s rising net income and strong revenue may reshape its investment narrative and growth...
